mapper.select: SELECT ec.title title, ec.cover cover, ec.lesson_num lessonNum, ec.price price, es1.title subjectLevelOne, es2.title subjectLevelTwo, edu_teacher.name teacherName FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher ON ec.teacher_id = edu_teacher.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId} LIMIT 1
